fleet-apps-management
*********************


Description
===========

Fleet Application Management provides a centralized platform to help
you automate resource management tasks, validate patch compliance, and
enhance operational efficiency across an enterprise.


Available Commands
==================

* announcement-collection

  * list-announcements

* compliance

  * get

* compliance-report

  * get

* fleet

  * change-compartment

  * check-resource-tagging

  * confirm-targets

  * create

  * create-fleet-dynamic-resource-selection

  * create-fleet-environment-fleet-details

  * create-fleet-generic-fleet-details

  * create-fleet-group-fleet-details

  * create-fleet-manual-resource-selection

  * create-fleet-product-fleet-details

  * delete

  * generate-compliance-report

  * get

  * request-resource-validation

  * request-target-discovery

  * update

  * update-fleet-dynamic-resource-selection

  * update-fleet-manual-resource-selection

* fleet-apps-management-admin

  * compliance-policy

    * get

  * compliance-policy-collection

    * list-compliance-policies

  * compliance-policy-rule

    * create

    * create-compliance-policy-rule-patch-level-selection-details

    * create-compliance-policy-rule-patch-name-selection-details

    * create-compliance-policy-rule-patch-release-date-selection-
      details

    * delete

    * get

    * update

    * update-compliance-policy-rule-patch-level-selection-details

    * update-compliance-policy-rule-patch-name-selection-details

    * update-compliance-policy-rule-patch-release-date-selection-
      details

  * compliance-policy-rule-collection

    * list-compliance-policy-rules

  * onboarding

    * create

    * delete

    * enable-latest-policy

    * get

    * manage-settings

    * update

  * onboarding-collection

    * list-onboardings

  * onboarding-policy-collection

    * list-onboarding-policies

  * platform-configuration

    * change-compartment

    * create

    * create-platform-configuration-credential-config-category-details

    * create-platform-configuration-environment-config-category-
      details

    * create-platform-configuration-lifecycle-operation-config-
      category-details

    * create-platform-configuration-patch-type-config-category-details

    * create-platform-configuration-product-config-category-details

    * create-platform-configuration-product-stack-config-category-
      details

    * create-platform-configuration-self-hosted-instance-config-
      category-details

    * delete

    * get

    * update

    * update-platform-configuration-credential-config-category-details

    * update-platform-configuration-environment-config-category-
      details

    * update-platform-configuration-lifecycle-operation-config-
      category-details

    * update-platform-configuration-patch-type-config-category-details

    * update-platform-configuration-product-config-category-details

    * update-platform-configuration-product-stack-config-category-
      details

    * update-platform-configuration-self-hosted-instance-config-
      category-details

  * platform-configuration-collection

    * list-platform-configurations

  * property

    * change-compartment

    * create

    * delete

    * get

    * update

  * property-collection

    * list-properties

* fleet-apps-management-catalog

  * catalog-item

    * change-compartment

    * clone

    * configure

    * create

    * create-catalog-item-catalog-git-source-config

    * create-catalog-item-catalog-marketplace-source-config

    * create-catalog-item-catalog-par-source-config

    * create-catalog-item-catalog-source-template-config

    * delete

    * get

    * update

  * catalog-item-collection

    * list-catalog-items

  * catalog-item-variables-definition

    * get

* fleet-apps-management-maintenance-window

  * maintenance-window

    * create

    * delete

    * get

    * update

  * maintenance-window-collection

    * list-maintenance-windows

* fleet-apps-management-operations

  * compliance-record

    * export-compliance-report

  * compliance-record-aggregation-collection

    * summarize-compliance-record-counts

  * compliance-record-collection

    * list-compliance-records

  * execution

    * get

  * execution-collection

    * list-executions

  * installed-patch-collection

    * list-installed-patches

  * inventory-record-collection

    * list-inventory-records

  * job-activity

    * get

  * managed-entity-aggregation-collection

    * summarize-managed-entity-counts

  * patch

    * change-compartment

    * create

    * create-patch-generic-artifact-details

    * create-patch-platform-specific-artifact-details

    * delete

    * get

    * update

    * update-patch-generic-artifact-details

    * update-patch-platform-specific-artifact-details

  * patch-collection

    * list-patches

  * recommended-patch-collection

    * list-recommended-patches

  * report-collection

    * report

  * report-metadata-collection

    * list-report-metadata

  * resource-collection

    * list-resources

  * scheduled-fleet-collection

    * list-scheduled-fleets

  * scheduler-definition

    * create

    * create-scheduler-definition-custom-schedule

    * create-scheduler-definition-maintenance-window-schedule

    * delete

    * get

    * update

    * update-scheduler-definition-custom-schedule

    * update-scheduler-definition-maintenance-window-schedule

  * scheduler-definition-collection

    * list-scheduler-definitions

  * scheduler-execution-collection

    * list-scheduler-executions

  * scheduler-job

    * delete

    * get

    * manage-job-execution

    * manage-job-execution-action-group-based-user-action-details

    * manage-job-execution-step-based-user-action-details

    * update

  * scheduler-job-aggregation-collection

    * summarize-scheduler-job-counts

  * scheduler-job-collection

    * list-scheduler-jobs

  * step-collection

    * list-steps

  * target-component-collection

    * list-target-components

  * target-property-collection

    * list-target-properties

* fleet-apps-management-provision

  * provision

    * change-compartment

    * create

    * delete

    * get

    * update

  * provision-collection

    * list-provisions

* fleet-apps-management-runbooks

  * import-runbook-details

    * import-runbook

  * import-runbook-precheck-details

    * import-runbook-precheck

  * import-runbook-version-details

    * import-runbook-version

  * runbook

    * change-compartment

    * create

    * delete

    * export

    * export-runbook-transfer-runbook-object-storage-bucket-content-
      details

    * export-runbook-transfer-runbook-par-url-content-details

    * export-runbook-version

    * export-runbook-version-transfer-runbook-object-storage-bucket-
      content-details

    * export-runbook-version-transfer-runbook-par-url-content-details

    * get

    * publish

    * set-default

    * update

  * runbook-collection

    * list-runbooks

  * runbook-export

    * get

  * runbook-export-dependency-collection

    * find-runbook-export-dependency

  * runbook-export-status-collection

    * list-runbook-export-statuses

  * runbook-import

    * get

  * runbook-import-dependency-collection

    * find-runbook-import-dependency

    * find-runbook-import-dependency-transfer-runbook-object-storage-
      bucket-content-details

    * find-runbook-import-dependency-transfer-runbook-par-url-content-
      details

    * list-runbook-import-statuses

  * runbook-version

    * create

    * delete

    * get

    * update

  * runbook-version-collection

    * list-runbook-versions

  * task-record

    * change-compartment

    * delete

    * get

    * update

    * list-task-records

  * get

  * update

* fleet-property-collection

* fleet-resource

  * delete
